turkish_example_sentence: Biz o kış soğuk dağlarda beyaz kar manzarasını görmeyecektik.
english_example_sentence: We were not going to see the white snow landscape in the cold mountains that winter.
russian_example_sentence: Мы не собирались видеть белый снежный пейзаж в холодных горах той зимой.
